parameters.setup_sheet_id: Setup Google Sheets Id (not needed for JSON or Firestore config)
parameters.setup_json_url: Setup JSON URL (not needed for Sheets or Firestore config)
parameters.setup_firestore_collection: Setup Firestore collection (not needed for Sheets or JSON config)
parameters.bq_ops_dataset: Auxliary bigquery dataset used for Megalista operations
parameters.bq_location: Specify the location of the BigQuery dataset. E.g. US, us-central1, etc
